content: the feet should lay flat so it can stand on a table repeat for the other foot pokeball to dragonite reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin feet claws row 1 2 single_crochet and 1 turning chain row 2 decrease finish off leaving long tail repeat until you have 6 claws sew claws to feet with long tails i made the tip of the claw the starting knot i inserted the long tail into the foot then out about 3 stitches away up through the other side of the triangle of the claw then down the middle of the claw then out the bottom of the foot i then took the starting tail threaded that through the bottom of the foot and tied the two tails together and hid them in the foot i attached the center claw first then positioned the other two on either side legs/hips use yellow yarn round 1 6 single_crochet magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 round 4 18 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 round 6-7 12 single_crochet fill with a small amount of stuffing underfill so it still squishes round 7 decrease x 6 6 round 8 6 single_crochet round 9 finish off leaving a long tail sew opening closed by threading tapestry needle though all 6 single_crochet outer legs pokeball to dragonite reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin repeat for the other leg/hip sew legs and feet to body using some spare orange yarn and attach at either side of the bottom of the body where the orange part meets the yellow tummy part see image i pried open the leg so you can see the attachment point i worked on the inside and sewed the leg onto the body in a line going down the center of the leg hide the tails in the body eyes use dark green yarn row 1 chain 3 and 1 turning chain row 2 3 single_crochet the last single_crochet will be green but in the next row you will use white so change to white finish last stitch by pulling up a white loop turning chain in white row 3 working in the back loops 3 slip_stitch and finish off leaving a long tail repeat for the second eye but row three will be worked differently the eye needs to be a mirror image of the other eye so you will need to work kind of backwards when you make your turning chain do not turn your work still work in the back loops but they will now be the leg closest to you see images pokeball to dragonite reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin image working backwards when making the other eye sew the eyes to the head just above the nose pull the tails through the head to temporarily position the eyes then use the white tail and green tails to sew the eyes to the head sew up and down
